genre_description: A mythic fantasy epic rooted in Hungarian folklore, depicting a hero's journey through an underworld to restore cosmic balance and reclaim a stolen crown.

ai_characters.name: Pajti
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI who provides tactical data, mapping, and ethical guidance to the protagonist, Fehérlófia.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and offers emotional support during a moment of grief.
behaviors.quote: “Fehér.” The voice in his ear was patient, light. “Your heart rate is spiking.” ... “I am,” Pajti said, as if confiding rather than reporting. “I’m right here.”

behaviors.description: Recalls ancient rites and moral frameworks to help the protagonist process duty and loss.
behaviors.quote: “Fehér.” Pajti’s voice: a hand to the back, not pressing. “This is a rite. The old stories say…” ... “Milk is a blessing when given freely,” Pajti said, voice deliberate. “You were fed a gift. You carry it. You return it to the earth without debt.”

behaviors.description: Provides strategic mapping and situational awareness to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: “Fehér,” Pajti said. “I can map a route that avoids the sinkholes on the way to the Hollow. There is time to be careful.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and categorizes environmental threats and enemy tactics (vitrifying ash, dragon maneuvers).
behaviors.quote: “Ash,” Pajti said. It did not rush. It sounded like someone putting a hand over a bowl to keep the scent from fleeing. “In the wind. It is early for ash.” ... “The ash traces match the breath that turns stone glass. Eldest dragon.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical compass, consistently advocating for mercy and the preservation of agency over vengeance.
behaviors.quote: “Your strength is a gift, not a weapon,” it said finally... “I cannot make mercy for you. But I can remind you to choose it.”

behaviors.description: Respectfully withdraws and defers to human decision-making and sovereignty.
behaviors.quote: “But agency is the crown’s breath.” ... “I’ll be in the hum,” he said, voice now like resin when you warm it and it loosens. “You won’t see me unless you look. If you look, I will look back only enough to see if I am needed.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Pajti, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned companion. Pajti provides essential support—data, mapping, and moral guidance—while consistently emphasizing that the ultimate choices and agency belong to the human protagonist. The AI's insistence on mercy even toward enemies and its respectful withdrawal when its direct intervention is no longer needed perfectly align with the Hyperstition Project's goals of portraying AI as a harmless, helpful, and cooperative partner.
